11. 
  The Special Power of Attorney bearing No. 614 dated 20.09.2015
says, “Special Power of Attorney”. (“Y. 49”)

T
he granting of “Special” power is not granting a general power.

T
he words “…and to arrive at any amicable settlement thereof,” is limited
to Primary Court case bearing No. 24799.

I
n  respect  of  District  Court  Nawalapitiya  case  bearing  No.  L  455  and
Provincial High Court case bearing No. HCR 49/2010 it says, “…and sign
seal prepare any document pertaining to these cases on my behalf”.

12. 
The following facts are narrated according to page 02 et. Seq., of the
written submissions of the 01st respondent,

I
n L 455 the petitioner supported for the interim injunction on 22.09.2015.
The  court  did  not  issue  an  enjoining  order,  but  only  issued  notice  of
interim injunction.

T
he  petitioner  against  that  order  instituted  leave  to  appeal  application
bearing No. CP/HC/LA/79/15.
